_meta.description: Abstract concept catalog (skeleton). Each concept unifies similar entities across datasets.

Artist.description: A person or group responsible for creation or performance.
Artist.notes: May correspond to different local classes; unify via Wikidata when possible.

Work.notes: The Session 'Tune' maps partially to Work; keep separate for now.

Recording.notes: Not all datasets expose recordings; may expand later.

Tune.description: A traditional melody entry in The Session.
Tune.notes: Potentially align with Work via melodic equivalence heuristics (future).

TuneSet.notes: Join to Tune via membership relation.

Manuscript.notes: Cross-link to Work/Artist via composition / authorship.
